contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I would love to see any your project and how I could help or any other suggestions. Please fill in the form, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

contactForm.successText: I will reply to your message as soon as I can

currentJob.title: Frontend developer | Design UX/UI | DevOps | SEO | Translator
currentJob.description: Independent development of features of various scales and complexity, including full implementation, design, and integration with backend systems. Improved responsive layouts and resolved bugs across the application. Worked with React, MUI, React Spring, Three.js, Axios, and i18next for the frontend, alongside tools like ESLint, Prettier, and Husky for code quality. Achievement: Fully developed and implemented a multilingual support system, real-time posture monitoring feature, and an admin panel for managing user data autonomously.

hero.title: Hello there!
hero.name: I'm Vlad.
hero.intro: I am a beginner and ambitious developer with a deep understanding of modern technologies. My intensive hands-on experience and excellent knowledge enable me to approach tasks creatively and effectively. I am ready to apply my skills and energy to achieve your goals. My inclination towards active learning and rapid adaptation allows me to make a significant contribution to any project.

projectsData.title: SETO LOGISTIC | On-Demand Transport Solutions
projectsData.description: Developed a logistics web application providing users with tools to calculate transportation routes, select vehicles, and manage orders. Implemented key features such as dynamic pricing based on distance and vehicle type, multilingual support, and payment integration. Enhanced user experience with responsive design, interactive elements, and accessibility optimizations. The project utilized React for the frontend and integrated Netlify Functions for backend operations. Achievement: Successfully built a scalable, multilingual order system with secure payment functionality and real-time order tracking.

projectsData.title: Prix de l'or | Reliable Information for Precious Metal Evaluation
projectsData.description: Developed a web platform designed to provide users with comprehensive information about gold and other precious metals. The site includes features such as detailed descriptions of gold types (karats, coins, etc.), partner organizations offering metal evaluation services, and multilingual support to cater to a diverse audience. The project focused on delivering a responsive and user-friendly design, integrated with Netlify Functions for seamless data management. Achievement: Successfully created an informative and visually appealing platform tailored to the French market, ensuring accessibility and usability.

projectsData.title: Angel Systems | Innovation Conveyor
projectsData.description: Independent development of features of various scales and complexity, including full implementation, design, and integration with backend systems. Improved responsive layouts and resolved bugs across the application. Worked with React, MUI, React Spring, Three.js, Axios, and i18next for the frontend, alongside tools like ESLint, Prettier, and Husky for code quality. Achievement: Fully developed and implemented a multilingual support system, real-time posture monitoring feature, and an admin panel for managing user data autonomously.

projectsData.title: Tasty Treats
projectsData.description: Page with recipe search with theme toggle, various search filters, pagination, modal windows, with dynamic content rendering, animations and adding recipe to favorites logic. My tasks: search filters, in catalog, on-scroll animations.

projectsData.title: ContactHub
projectsData.description: A contact storage app with authorization, asynchronous Redux and a beautiful interface using Ant-design.

projectsData.title: The Watch Spot
projectsData.description: A landing page with wide functionality, including theme switch, selecting watch from catalog, slider, mobile menu, and modal window, scroll-up button, and obviously, beautiful animations. My tasks: modal window, mobile menu.

projectsData.title: Filmic explorer
projectsData.description: A small app about movies to improve routing.
